mapper.select:
select 'false' as QUERYID,
from ( SELECT distinct br.organization_id branch_id, brv.branch_code branch_code, br.organization_name branch_name FROM wos_organizations wo JOIN wos_organization_versions wov ON wov.organization_id = wo.organization_id AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN wov.date_from AND wov.date_to AND wov.is_head_office = 0 JOIN wos_locations wl ON wov.location_id = wl.location_id JOIN wos_location_versions wlv ON wlv.location_id = wl.location_id AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN wlv.date_from AND wlv.date_to LEFT JOIN wos_organizations br ON wlv.branch_owner_id = br.organization_id LEFT JOIN wos_organization_versions brv ON brv.organization_id = br.organization_id AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN brv.date_from AND brv.date_to WHERE wo.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} UNION SELECT -1 organization_id, 'HEADOFFICE' organization_code, 'Head Office' organization_name FROM DUAL) where BRANCH_ID = #{branchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ROWNUM=1

select 'false' as QUERYID,
from ( SELECT distinct br.organization_id branch_id, brv.branch_code branch_code, /*brv.branch_code gl_code,*/ br.organization_name branch_name FROM wos_organizations wo JOIN wos_organization_versions wov ON wov.organization_id = wo.organization_id AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN wov.date_from AND wov.date_to AND wov.is_head_office = 0 JOIN wos_locations wl ON wov.location_id = wl.location_id JOIN wos_location_versions wlv ON wlv.location_id = wl.location_id AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN wlv.date_from AND wlv.date_to LEFT JOIN wos_organizations br ON wlv.branch_owner_id = br.organization_id LEFT JOIN wos_organization_versions brv ON brv.organization_id = br.organization_id AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN brv.date_from AND brv.date_to WHERE wo.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} UNION SELECT -1 organization_id, 'HEADOFFICE' organization_code, 'Head Office' organization_name FROM DUAL)

select distinct count(*) from ( SELECT distinct br.organization_id branch_id, brv.branch_code branch_code, /*brv.branch_code gl_code,*/ br.organization_name branch_name FROM wos_organizations wo JOIN wos_organization_versions wov ON wov.organization_id = wo.organization_id AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN wov.date_from AND wov.date_to AND wov.is_head_office = 0 JOIN wos_locations wl ON wov.location_id = wl.location_id JOIN wos_location_versions wlv ON wlv.location_id = wl.location_id AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN wlv.date_from AND wlv.date_to LEFT JOIN wos_organizations br ON wlv.branch_owner_id = br.organization_id LEFT JOIN wos_organization_versions brv ON brv.organization_id = br.organization_id AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN brv.date_from AND brv.date_to WHERE wo.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} UNION SELECT -1 organization_id, 'HEADOFFICE' organization_code, 'Head Office' organization_name FROM DUAL)

select distinct 'false' as QUERYID,
from ( SELECT distinct br.organization_id branch_id, brv.branch_code branch_code, /*brv.branch_code gl_code,*/ br.organization_name branch_name FROM wos_organizations wo JOIN wos_organization_versions wov ON wov.organization_id = wo.organization_id AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN wov.date_from AND wov.date_to AND wov.is_head_office = 0 JOIN wos_locations wl ON wov.location_id = wl.location_id JOIN wos_location_versions wlv ON wlv.location_id = wl.location_id AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN wlv.date_from AND wlv.date_to LEFT JOIN wos_organizations br ON wlv.branch_owner_id = br.organization_id LEFT JOIN wos_organization_versions brv ON brv.organization_id = br.organization_id AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN brv.date_from AND brv.date_to WHERE wo.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} UNION SELECT -1 organization_id, 'HEADOFFICE' organization_code, 'Head Office' organization_name FROM DUAL)
order by branch_code asc
